snippet: The company accused 21 people of circumventing its online security system to try to buy huge numbers of tickets to resell at a profit.
abstract: Ticketmaster sues 21 people, accusing them of fraud and breach of copyright in circumventing the company's online security system to purchase large numbers of tickets; company is trying to fight the computer tactics used by some of the most advanced ticket scalpers.
lead_paragraph: The company accused 21 people of circumventing its online security system to try to buy huge numbers of tickets to resell at a profit.

headline.main: Ticketmaster Accuses 21 of Fraudulent Ticket Buying
headline.print_headline: Ticketmaster Accuses 21 of Fraudulent Ticket Buying
